query:
UPDATE subscription
            SET modification_date_time = now(),
                client_name = $2,
                program_id = $3,
                object_operations = $4
            WHERE id = $1
              AND ($5::text IS NULL OR client_id = $5)
            RETURNING
                id,
                created_date_time,
                modification_date_time,
                client_name,
                program_id,
                object_operations
